name: Digital Visual Media Forum
paragraphs: As one of the initiatives of HH Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz, “MISK” foundation, the forum intended to discuss the content industry in the virtual world and to interact with local and global social media figures and influencers.

Misk Foundation’s Shoof is an annual, youth-focused event that presents opportunities and inspirations in digital visual media. The event brought together the leading success stories from the visual media sector which in turn helped informing the attendees with the latest trends, insights and ideas shaping social media.

entourage, as one of the leading event organizers in KSA, managed the overall event with utmost professionalism and perfection. We managed all the aspects of the event ranging from the content creation, agenda development, event planning to logistics as well as promoting the event on both PR and media fronts, in addition to activations and onsite management.
